speaker: char
text: What’s up, my favorite makeup person!

speaker: char
text: The last date? It didn’t work but who cares! I finally realized what I really want. And this time it really is what I want and what I think others want me to want.

speaker: char
text: Would you do me the honor of going on a date with me? You really helped me realize that I am good just as I am and don’t really have to try so hard to please everyone.

speaker: char
text: I feel so good about this I’m not gonna even ask how would you like to do my makeup!
